document_data.name: Sharptongue Travelling Troupe
document_data.mainbody: e Sharptongue Travelling Troupe were known for being the actors of ''[[The Folly and the Fall]]''.
document_data.Activities: The Sharptongue Travelling Troupe were known for being the actors of ''[[The Folly and the Fall]]''.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The troupe, along with thaumaturges, were said to have sent [[Elturel]]'s [[Everlight Theatre]] into chaos.
